GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Link Payments Global Change Test
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Associate a revenue selection to a bank account deposit - Test
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_REVENUELINKPAYMENTS ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @IDSETREGISTERID uniqueidentifier, @BANKACCOUNTID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime --set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); --set @CURRENTDATE = cast(convert(nvarchar(30), GETDATE(), as datetime); set @CURRENTDATE = cast(GETDATE() as date); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
declare @IDSETREGISTER table (ID uniqueidentifier primary key) insert into @IDSETREGISTER select * from dbo.ufn_IdSetReader_GetResults_guId(@IDSETREGISTERID)
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try declare @ID uniqueidentifier declare @PAYMENTXML xml
-- First create a new deposit for the bank account exec USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_DEPOSIT @ID output, @BANKACCOUNTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, '', @CURRENTDATE, 1, @CURRENTDATE, 0, 0, 1
--------- declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), REVENUEID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select ID from @IDSETREGISTER SelectionResults
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin
select @REVENUEID = REVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
-- Get the selected revenue into the XML format set @PAYMENTXML = (select [REVENUE].[ID], [REVENUE].[DATE] as [TRANSACTIONDATE], [REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD].[PAYMENTMETHOD], [REVENUE].[AMOUNT], [REVENUE].[TRANSACTIONTYPE] from dbo.REVENUE --inner join @IDSETREGISTER I on REVENUE.ID = I.ID inner join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD on REVENUE.ID = REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD.REVENUEID where revenue.id = @REVENUEID for xml raw('ITEM'),type,elements,root('PAYMENTS'),BINARY BASE64)
begin try begin transaction -- Link the payments exec USP_LINKPAYMENTSTODEPOSIT @ID output, @CHANGEAGENTID, @ID, @PAYMENTXML commit transaction set @NUMBERADDED = @NUMBERADDED+1 end try begin catch --do nothing, just skip this and it will show up as unlinked payment rollback transaction end catch
set @I = @I + 1 --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end
--------- end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
